body_html:
looks that the issue is still there. I'm using virtualenv 15.0.1 and the latest tensorflow code (ae62a69) on ubuntu 16.04 x64.

$virtualenv -p python3 ~/pyenv/tfbuild
$source ~/pyenv/tfbuild/bin/activate
(tfbuild) yguo18@yguo18-skl-u1604:/work/ml/tensorflow_work/tensorflow$ ./configure
WARNING: ignoring http_proxy in environment.
WARNING: --batch mode is deprecated. Please instead explicitly shut down your Bazel server using the command "bazel shutdown".
You have bazel 0.15.0 installed.
Please specify the location of python. [Default is /home/yguo18/pyenv/tfbuild/bin/python]:

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in
AttributeError: module 'site' has no attribute 'getsitepackages'
Found possible Python library paths:
/home/yguo18/pyenv/tfbuild/lib/python3.6/site-packages
Please input the desired Python library path to use. Default is [/home/yguo18/pyenv/tfbuild/lib/python3.6/site-packages]
/home/yguo18/pyenv/tfbuild/lib/python3.6/site-packages
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with jemalloc as malloc support? [Y/n]: n
No jemalloc as malloc support will be enabled for TensorFlow.
...

body:
looks that the issue is still there. I'm using virtualenv 15.0.1 and the latest tensorflow code (ae62a692ddb53253462c1f79702fbc45baeb4ae3) on ubuntu 16.04 x64.

$virtualenv -p python3 ~/pyenv/tfbuild
$source ~/pyenv/tfbuild/bin/activate
(tfbuild) yguo18@yguo18-skl-u1604:/work/ml/tensorflow_work/tensorflow$ ./configure 
WARNING: ignoring http_proxy in environment.
WARNING: --batch mode is deprecated. Please instead explicitly shut down your Bazel server using the command "bazel shutdown".
You have bazel 0.15.0 installed.
Please specify the location of python. [Default is /home/yguo18/pyenv/tfbuild/bin/python]: 


Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
AttributeError: module 'site' has no attribute 'getsitepackages'
Found possible Python library paths:
  /home/yguo18/pyenv/tfbuild/lib/python3.6/site-packages
Please input the desired Python library path to use.  Default is [/home/yguo18/pyenv/tfbuild/lib/python3.6/site-packages]
/home/yguo18/pyenv/tfbuild/lib/python3.6/site-packages
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with jemalloc as malloc support? [Y/n]: n
No jemalloc as malloc support will be enabled for TensorFlow.
...
